overview.ovdesc:
DW DW.BULK.EXTRACT DW.BULK.EXTRACT
This application is to specify which table(s) should be extracted from T24 and populated in an external data store.

desc.p: This field specifies the pre-selection for T24 table which should be migrated.
Validation Rules

:
1) Must be inputted when FLD.SELECTION is specified 2) Any of these EQ_NE_GT_LT_RG_NR_LK_UL_LE_GE values are allowed
This field specifies the pre-selection for T24 table which should be migrated.
Validation Rules

:
1) Valid field on T24 table. 2) This field accepts Single, Multi-value and Local Ref fields 2) Optional input.
This field specifies the pre-selection for T24 table which should be migrated.
Validation Rules

:
1) Must be inputted when FLD.SELECTION is specified 2) This field accepts only single value except for RG,NR where two values are allowed to specify delimited with space.
Defines the status of DW.BULK.EXTRACT record.
Validation Rules
: 1) Can be PENDING,RUNNING and MIGRATED. 2) Record can't be edited when it is in RUNNING status. 3) Record in PENDING and MIGRATED status can be edited and re-used
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Specified T24 table that should be migrated.
Validation Rules

:
1) Can be any of these HULTWD PGM type 2) Mandatory input
This field holds the ID of company record. This is to specify from which company the data to be extracted for non-INT files. This field is not applicable for INT type files.
Validation Rules

:
1) Valid record key on COMPANY table 2) Mandatory input for Non-INT files

t.desc: Contains description of the record. mandatory input.

desc.p: This field is to incorporate Java Rule engine for DW extraction. This rule will determine which records should be extracted.
Validation Rules

:
1) Valid record key on EB.RULE.GATEWAY table 2) Optional input
